name: Double Union Data Analysis Workshop
tagline: Data Analysis and Visualization with Clojure / Incanter and ClojureScript / D3
body:
This workshop illustrates how to put together a data analysis and visualization application from the ground up.  This includes the use of functional programming with some light discussion of using multiple concurrent processes.

### Github Repository

Please check out the repository at http://github.com/alyssackwan/doubleunion-dataanalysis-workshop/.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
